👉 $PANW : Palo Alto stock, which broke out powerfully in late February but then pulled back into the base and its 50-day line on Monday, rebounded strongly over the next four sessions. That's technically no longer valid due to the sharp sell-off, but that's also about where a new short trendline entry falls.

👉 $AVGO : Broadcom stock rose 5.7% last week to 610.92. The chipmaker has an official buy point of 677.86 but investors could use 614.74, just above the Feb. 10 high, as an early entry. Aggressive traders could start a position in AVGO stock now, after retaking the 50-day late last week.
